summary:
Fascinated by business insights and the power that data-driven strategies have to unlock commercial value, from both customers and suppliers. 

Experienced senior leader, manager, and bridge builder. Adept at connecting the right dots across organizations to deliver impact & value.

Think. Question. Explore. 
"I have no special talents, I am only passionately curious" - Albert Einstein

profile_positions.description:
Define the scope, options/alternatives, structures, designs, set-ups for success of key cross-functional, high impact commercial strategy initiatives 
Communicate program vision & objectives with a compelling storyline to key stakeholders, backed by relevant supporting data/research to build consensus and alignment among cross-functional teams including all Partner Services departments
Execute/coordinate execution of key commercial strategy programs including guiding principles, governance model, key processes and securing accountability for each critical program dependency to ensure delivery of a cohesive portfolio strategy
In close collaboration with Central Partner Services, drive change management to embed key commercial strategic programs effectively in the organisation
Establish an effective program monitoring and governance cadence, reviewing / reporting historical performance/learnings to create transparency and improve future efficiency of execution
Continuously assess existing/new initiatives and provide strategic recommendations for steering program evolution to support the long term strategic ambitions and measures of success
Provide consultation to the PS Leadership Team (and the rest of the Extended Leadership Team) to inform the continued development and annual planning of commercial strategy, objectives and KPIs
profile_positions.title: Commercial Strategy Manager (Global)

profile_positions.description:
A multi-functional role, I led a team of Business Analysts & Project/Campaign Managers, and together we were responsible for coordinated tactical and strategic commercial growth based on opportunities that we uncover in our vast datasets. Our scope included Discovery, Pre & Post Analysis, Enablement, GTM planning, channel coordination & activation as well as measuring & reporting on results. We executed on these opportunities across our digital channels, our account management functions as well as 3rd party software providers.

Manage cross-functional programs consisting of multiple functional workstreams
Co-develop strategic initiatives to improve performance in the contact centers and local offices
Drive large scale operating model change projects to improve channel performance (e.g. projects related to roles, target setting, organization structure, tooling, productivity, reporting)
Identify commercial and operational improvements by collecting information, generating insights and recommendations
Ensure cross channel aligned approach to drive go-to-market projects to improve Partner performance
Increase ROI based performance of local offices (contact centers & local offices)
Explore and drive commercial initiatives coming from Product, Region and own Analyses to increase partner engagement and experience
Coordinate with relevant global & regional teams to ensure adequate implementation, communication, training & tracking of successful Commercial Excellence projects
profile_positions.title: Global Commercial Excellence Manager

profile_positions.description:
Work closely together with the internal communities to understand local needs & priorities
Identify and analyse commercial opportunities
Drive & support projects that vary in complexity, scope & length
Develop and map out efficient roadmaps for commercial projects, create clear pictures of what can be achieved and evaluate the pace of projects
Ensure proper stakeholder engagement and alignment across workgroups
Build an effective communication structure with stakeholders across the community and department to drive deliverables.
Formulate and/or create story telling materials to increase the commercial knowledge of local teams
Create playbook  for  growth hacks  and/or  share  best  practices  to  increase  commercial effectiveness.
Analyse and support local business cases that are requested to drive performance in the local offices.
Ensure excellent quantity and quality reports to track global performance of key metrics. 
Share insights and opportunities to drive change within the product teams
profile_positions.title: Commercial Excellence Specialist
